snippet.title: SomnaBuster - Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
SOMNABUSTER, RELEASING SEPTEMBER 24TH, 2024 - BE WILD, BE WONDERFUL, BE-WITCHING

DEMO OUT NOW

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2598190/SomnaBuster/

---

IF THE DREAM IS REAL TO YOU, IT IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR

Accounting student Macy is down on her luck and out of her mind, but her life of hum-drum is abruptly interrupted by a visit from a mysterious firefly. After stumbling down a seemingly endless hole, she wakes up in a strange new world. With an explosive broom in tow, Macy sets out discover the mysteries of Esperanto and find her way home.

SomnaBuster is a 2D platformer inspired by 16-bit classics of the past and unbound dreams of the future. Run, jump, flip, fly, wall-cling and swing your way through dozens of mesmerizing worlds.
